Node.Name: OwnershipNotRegistered
Node.Text: Due to ownership of this metadata reference set is not registered it is unable to complete requested operation.

Node.Name: NoPreferredResolver
Node.Text: Due to resolver abscence it is unable to resolve the specified metadata reference.

Node.Name: NameCanNotBeNull
Node.Text: The metadata local name in the reference cannot be null.

Node.Name: NameCanNotBeEmpty
Node.Text: The metadata local name in the reference cannot be empty.

Node.Name: MetadataReferenceNotValidException
Node.Text: The metadata reference is not valid.

Node.Name: MetadataReferenceNotResolvedException
Node.Text: Не удалось разрешить ссылку на метаданные. Метаданные по указанной ссылке не найдены.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: A metadata has not been validated yet and cannot be used.\r\nMetadata: '{0}'.

Node.Name: MetadataNotCompliantReferenceException
Node.Text: Тип метаданных '{0}' не соответствует ожидаемому типу '{1}', указанному в ссылке.

Node.Name: InvalidMetadataNameException
Node.Text: Указанное значение не является именем метаданных.

Node.Name: NullOrEmpty
Node.Text: $(resolve(/Eon/Metadata/InvalidMetadataNameException)) Значение не может быть ни '$(resolve(/_Dict/Null))', ни пустой строкой.

Node.Name: TooLong
Node.Text: $(resolve(/Eon/Metadata/InvalidMetadataNameException)) Значение имеет слишком большую длину. Длина значения превышает максимально допустимую ('{0:d}' символов). Длина указанного значения '{1:d}'.

Node.Name: PathNameContainsTooManyComponents
Node.Text: $(resolve(/Eon/Metadata/InvalidMetadataNameException)) Указанное значение '{0}' содержит слишком много компонентов ('{1:d}' компонентов). Максимально допустимое количество компонентов '{2:d}'.

Node.Name: MetadataReferenceException
Node.Text: Ошибка в ходе операции над ссылкой на метаданные.

Node.Name: MetadataException
Node.Text: Ошибка в ходе операции над метаданными.

Node.Name: NameNotGenerated
Node.Text: The metadata name has not been generated.

Node.Name: NameCanNotBeNull
Node.Text: The metadata name cannot be null.

Node.Name: GuidCanNotBeEmpty
Node.Text: The metadata GUID cannot be empty (i.e. '{0:d}').

Node.Name: ReachedMaxValue
Node.Text: The '{0}' generator is unable to generate a next number. The generator has reached the '{1}' value of the limit of the generating numbers.

Node.Name: OperationNotAllowedOnDefinition
Node.Text: The '{0}' is the property definition. The requested operation cannot be performed on the property definition.

Node.Name: OperationAllowedOnDefinitionOnly
Node.Text: The '{0}' is not a property definition. The requested operation cannot be performed.

Node.Name: NotPassedReflection
Node.Text: The '{0}' property cannot be used in the context of the current operation. The property has not passed the reflection and thus the property cannot be treated as a member of a type.

Node.Name: ErrorOnInspecting
Node.Text: An error occurred while inspecting the property.

Node.Name: NotEndedDefinition
Node.Text: It is unable to complete the requested operation on the '{0}' property. The property definition has not been ended yet.

Node.Name: DefinitionEnded
Node.Text: It is unable to complete the requested operation on the '{1}' property. The requested operation can be performed when the property is defining state only.

Node.Name: NotUIEditable
Node.Text: Свойство '{0}' объекта '{1}' не должно редактироваться посредством пользовательского интерфейса.

Node.Name: PropertyNameNotUnique
Node.Text: The '{0}' name of property is not unique. The name of property must be unique among all properties names of an element.

Node.Name: PropertyFieldNotInitialized
Node.Text: The property field is not initialized.

Node.Name: TypeMetadataPropertyDefinedAlready
Node.Text: The '{0}' property defines a type metadata property, but the type metadata property is defined already by the '{1}' property. Each type can have only one definition of the type metadata property.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: An error detected in the business type definition (type: '{0}').

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: An error detected in the property field definition (field: '{0}', name of the declaring type of the field: '{1}').

Node.Name: RefValueCanBeSetOnce
Node.Text: Значение идентификатора объекта в хранилище данных допустимо устанавливать только единажды. Он может быть установлен либо во время материализации (чтения) объекта из хранилища данных, либо при записи нового объекта в хранилище данных. Объект, для которого была предпринята попытка установки значения '{0}'.

Node.Name: DataContainerTypeNotSupportedForBounding
Node.Text: A data container of the '{0}' type isn't supported for bounding (instance type is '{1}').

Node.Name: DueEditingStateOperationUnavailable
Node.Text: Due to the '{0}' instance is in edit state, the requested operation cannot be performed on the one.

Node.Name: EditUnavailable
Node.Text: An edit operation on the '{0}' instance is unavailable now. Possibly, other write/read operation performs now.

Node.Name: DueHasDataErrorsOperationUnavailable
Node.Text: Due to the '{0}' instance has a data errors, the requested operation cannot be performed on the one. Some properties aren't filled up or are filled up with invalid values.

Node.Name: AlreadyBoundWithDataContainer
Node.Text: The '{0}' instance has been bounded with data container already.

Node.Name: NotBoundedWithDataContainer
Node.Text: The '{0}' not bounded with data container.

Node.Name: CanNotDeleteNew
Node.Text: Операция удаления не применима для новых объектов.

Node.Name: DueApprovedOperationNotAvailable
Node.Text: Документ '{0}' уже утвержден. Операция недоступна для утвержденного документа.

Node.Name: DueNotApprovedUnusable
Node.Text: Документ '{0}' не утвержден и поэтому не может участвовать в текущей операции.

Node.Name: ErrorOnRevokeApproval
Node.Text: При отмене утверждения документа '{0}' возникла ошибка.

Node.Name: ApprovedAlready
Node.Text: Документ '{0}' уже утвержден. Если требуется выполнить утверждение документа повторно, то сначала необходимо отменить ранее выполненное утверждение.

Node.Name: NotApprovedYet
Node.Text: Документ '{0}' еще не утвержден или ранее уже была выполнена отмена утверждения документа.

Node.Name: AttemptEditApproved
Node.Text: Документ '{0}' утвержден. Редактирование утвержденных документов не допускается.

Node.Name: AttemptDeleteApproved
Node.Text: Документ '{0}' утвержден. Удаление утвержденных документов не допускается.

Node.Name: Hint
Node.Text: - соответствие всем или одному из указанных критериев

Node.Name: ServiceRootUriNotSpecified
Node.Text: A service root URI is not specified.

Node.Name: ODataServiceClientNotSpecified
Node.Text: An OData-service client is not specified.

Node.Name: EntityOfUnexpectedTypeMaterializedFromResponse
Node.Text: An entity of the '{0}' type was materialized from data containing in the service response. The entity of this type is not expected in the response. An entities of the '{1}' type are expected (data container is '{2}').

Node.Name: Approve
Node.Text: Утвердить — уже утвержденные документы обрабатываться не будут

Node.Name: AboutRequestStop
Node.Text: A stop is requesting for the core app.

Node.Name: ErrorInfoNotSpecified
Node.Text: <Источник ошибки не указал данные об ошибке.>

Node.Name: MessageBodyTrimmedWarning
Node.Text: <ВНИМАНИЕ! Приведенный текст является сокращенным вариантом исходного текста, так как размер исходного текста превышал допустимый предел.>

Node.Name: SequentialIdCounterReachedMaxValue
Node.Text: It is unable to issue logging notification. There is not an available sequential identifier. The sequential identifier counter has reached the max. value.

Node.Name: DataContainerNotSpecified
Node.Text: A data container is not specified.

Node.Name: Init
Node.Text: It is an initialization message. It means that the subscriber is ready to write a logging notifications to the current persistent storage.

Node.Name: NoInstanceContractConstructor
Node.Text: The '{0}' description type has not an instance contract which might be used to create an instance of the '{1}' requested type. Or no one from existing contracts specifies the type compatible with the requested type and with the '{2}' constructor.

Node.Name: ServiceNotSupportsPathRoaming
Node.Text: A path roaming is not supported by the '{0}' service.

Node.Name: LimeInfoAttributeNotDefined
Node.Text: A Lime's info attribute is not defined on the '{0}' assembly.

Node.Name: LimeInfoAttributeNotSpecifiesVersion
Node.Text: The defined on the '{0}' assembly Lime's info attribute not specifies a version.

Node.Name: ProviderSupplied
Node.Text: Провайдер среды Lime уже был установлен. Провайдер может быть установлен только единажды в течение жизненного цикла домена приложения.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: A service of the '{0}' type has not been provided by the '{1}' Lime-environment provider.

Node.Name: NegativeDispatchersCount
Node.Text: A dispatchers count cannot be a negative number.

Node.Name: DispatchersCountTooBig
Node.Text: The '{0:d}' specified count of dispatchers is too much. The dispatchers count cannot be more than max. degree of parallelism of the task scheduler, that has been assigned to publisher (actual max. DOP of the scheduler is '{1:d}').

Node.Name: DispatchersCountExceedsLimit
Node.Text: The '{0:d}' count of dispatchers exceeds the '{1:d}' limit.

Node.Name: InstanceNotCreatedYetException
Node.Text: Instance has not been created yet.

Node.Name: ComparerNotSelected
Node.Text: There is not known comparer for the '{0}' type. Possibly, the '{0}' type not implements the interface '{1}'.

Node.Name: InsufficientCapacityOfCollection
Node.Text: Unable to add (or insert) an item to a collection. The '{0:d}' configured capacity of the collection is insufficient.

Node.Name: ValueCanNotBeNull
Node.Text: Значением узла дерева метаданных не может быть null-значение.

Node.Name: NonUniqueMetadataName
Node.Text: Имена метаданных, представленных дочерними узлами одного узла дерева метаданных, должны быть уникальными. Обнаружены метаданные с именем '{1}', которое не является уникальным среди имен метаданных, представленных дочерними узлами узла '{0}'.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: Требуемый ресурс или сущность данных не найдены.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: The bounding the '{0}' instance with the data container has faulted.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: Возникла ошибка при выполнении операции контейнера данных '{0}'.

Node.Name: ContextNotCreated
Node.Text: A context of the '{0}' type has not been created by the '{1}' factory. The context creation function has not returned a context.

Node.Name: CanNotCreateContextOfType
Node.Text: The '{0}' factory cann't create a context of the '{1}' type.

Node.Name: MismatchOfCreatedContextType
Node.Text: The '{0}' type of the '{1}' created context (by the '{2}' factory) is mismatch to the '{3}' requested type.

Node.Name: ErrorOnBoundMaterializedInstance
Node.Text: An error occurred while bounding the '{0}' instance materialized by the '{1}' context of the '{2}' data container.

Node.Name: NullEntityMaterialized
Node.Text: The '{0}' context of the '{1}' container has materialized a null entity.

Node.Name: InstanceNotBoundedWithThisContainer
Node.Text: The requested operation cannot be performed. The '{0}' instance is not bounded with the '{1}' container.

Node.Name: ContainerTypeIncompatibleWithBase
Node.Text: The '{0}' type (specified in the container types) is incompatible with the '{1}' base type of the '{2}' container.

Node.Name: NoContainerTypes
Node.Text: The '{0}' container have not a types. The getting function has returned an empty types set.

Node.Name: TypeNotInContainer
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is not enumerated in the valid types of the '{1}' container.

Node.Name: NotOpenedOrClosingState
Node.Text: The '{0}' container is not opened or is closing.

Node.Name: ContextNotOpened
Node.Text: The '{0}' container has not been opened yet.

Node.Name: OpenSentAlready
Node.Text: An open operation has been begun already.

Node.Name: CanNotPerformOpenBecauseCloseSent
Node.Text: An open operation cannot be completed. A close operation has been begun already.

Node.Name: StorageNotCreated
Node.Text: A storage has not been created. The storage creation function has returned a null value.

Node.Name: ConnectionStringNameNotSpecified
Node.Text: A connection string name is not specified.

Node.Name: ConnectionStringMissingInConfig
Node.Text: There is not the '{0}' connection string in the application configuration ('.config').

Node.Name: ConnectionStringNullOrWhiteSpace
Node.Text: The '{0}' connection string specified in the application configuration is null, empty or consists white-space characters only.

Node.Name: ConnectionStringNullOrWhiteSpace
Node.Text: The specified connection string is null, empty or consists only white-space characters.

Node.Name: DataSourceNotSpecified
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified connection string not specifies a data source.

Node.Name: ContextNotCreated
Node.Text: An object context has not been created by the '{0}' instance. The context creation function has not returned a context.

Node.Name: DueNotAppropriatedEntitySetUnableInsert
Node.Text: Unable to insert the '{0}' instance to the '{1}' container. No an appropriated set for the '{2}' type of the instance.

Node.Name: CreatedContextNotConformsReadOnlyFlag
Node.Text: The '{0}' created context not conforms to read-only requirement (actual requirement is '{1}').

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: Объект был изменен (или удален) в хранилище данных. Необходимо выполнить перечитывание объекта.

Node.Name: ErrorOnConfigureEntityType
Node.Text: An error occurred while configuring the '{0}' entity type.

Node.Name: ErrorOnSaveDataToDatabase
Node.Text: An exception occurred while saving the data to the data store.

Node.Name: ContextIsReadOnly
Node.Text: Due to the '{0}' context is in read-only state, the requested operation rejected.

Node.Name: PassedObjectSetCanNotContainEntityOfType
Node.Text: The '{0}' passed object set (type is '{1}') cannot contain an entities of the '{2}' type.

Node.Name: CsvDifferntHeaderCountAndColumnCountError
Node.Text: Bad file format. Some strings has different columns count with headers count.

Node.Name: EmptyCsvFile
Node.Text: The specified CSV file is empty.

Node.Name: PathTypeNotValid
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified type cannot be used to reference the resource tree node.

Node.Name: NodePathNotValid
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified resource node path is not valid.

Node.Name: NodeNotFoundByPath
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified resource node path cannot be resolved to the resource node. No matched node found.

Node.Name: InvalidTextFormat
Node.Text: The text of the '{0}' resource node has been specified in incorrect format.

Node.Name: CyclicNodeReferenceOccurred
Node.Text: The text of the '{0}' resource node contains the cyclic reference to other resource node.

Node.Name: InsufficientArgsToExpandNodeReference
Node.Text: The text of the '{0}' resource node requires more arguments than has been specified.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: В процессе взаимодействия возникла одна или более ошибок.

Node.Name: CurrentHostIsNotOfType
Node.Text: Тип хоста сервиса не соответствует запрошенному '{0}'. Хост сервиса имеет тип '{1}'.

Node.Name: DefaultFaultReason
Node.Text: An error occurred during the service operation.

Node.Name: AnonymousOperationCallNotAllowed
Node.Text: An attempt to perform an operation anonymously was made. The current operation cannot be performed anonymously.

Node.Name: PlatformServiceHostNotCreated
Node.Text: The '{0}' instance doesn't create a platform service host.

Node.Name: ServiceInstanceProviderNotCreated
Node.Text: The '{0}' instance doesn't create a service instance provider.

Node.Name: InvalidConstructorString
Node.Text: The specified constructor string has invalid format.

Node.Name: UnableCreateHost
Node.Text: Unable to create the service host instance.

Node.Name: EndpointAddressNotListed
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified endpoint address is not listed in the service client description.

Node.Name: InvalidMethodCallMessage
Node.Text: The passed method call message is invalid and cannot be processed.\r\nNote that the method call message must not have an variable arguments or method output parameters.

Node.Name: NoMethodCallMessageHandler
Node.Text: Unable to process the passed method call message. There is not method call message handler.

Node.Name: ServiceHostNotSpecified
Node.Text: A host is not specified for the service.

Node.Name: Print
Node.Text: An error has occurred during printing the form.

Node.Name: NoDefaultPrinter
Node.Text: $(resolve(/Eon/Drawing/Printing/PrintForm/PrintForm/Print))\r\nThe default printer not presented in the OS.

Node.Name: NoPageToPrint
Node.Text: $(resolve(/Eon/Drawing/Printing/PrintForm/PrintForm/Print))\r\nThe specified print-form no contain pages to print.

Node.Name: PageSizeIsOutOfPrintableArea
Node.Text: $(resolve(/Eon/Drawing/Printing/PrintForm/PrintForm/Print))\r\nThe '{0}' page size if out of the printable area.

Node.Name: PageMarginIsOutOfPrinterMargin
Node.Text: $(resolve(/Eon/Drawing/Printing/PrintForm/PrintForm/Print))\r\nThe '{0}' page margins is out of the printer physical margins.

Node.Name: WidthOfElementIsOutOfPrintAreaWidth
Node.Text: $(resolve(/Eon/Drawing/Printing/PrintForm/PrintForm/Print))\r\nThe '{0:G}' width of the '{1}' element is out of the '{2:G}' print area width.

Node.Name: UnableExpandVar
Node.Text: The '{0}' supplied expander is unable to expand the '{1}' print form variable specified in the '{2}' element.

Node.Name: InconsequentOperation
Node.Text: The requested operation cannot be performed in the current workflow. This operation was been performed in the current workflow already.

Node.Name: OperationNotAvailable
Node.Text: Unable to perform an operation. Operation is not available.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: Недостаточно параметров операции (или параметры заданы неверно) для её выполнения.

Node.Name: InvalidStateException
Node.Text: Due to object's invalid state an operation cannot be performed.

Node.Name: OneCEnterpriseAddInException
Node.Text: An 1C: Enterprise add-in exception was thrown.

Node.Name: InvalidAddInImplementationIdException
Node.Text: Add-in implementation Id doesn't conform the rules:\r\n1) Null or empty string value not allowed.

Node.Name: AddInImplementationNotFoundException
Node.Text: The specified add-in implementation not found.

Node.Name: InvalidMaxDOP
Node.Text: The '{0:d}' specified value of max. degree of parallelism is not valid.

Node.Name: InvalidMaxQueueLength
Node.Text: The '{0:d}' specified value of max. scheduler queue length is not valid.

Node.Name: InvalidScheduler
Node.Text: There was attempt to execute the '{0}' task on the '{1}' scheduler. However, it was expected the task will executes on the '{2}' scheduler.

Node.Name: RepeatedStartAttempt
Node.Text: An attempt to start the instance was been made already. The attempt was resulted with the '{0}' state.

Node.Name: OtherTaskAssociated
Node.Text: Other task '{0}' was associated with this instance.

Node.Name: NoAssociatedTask
Node.Text: No run task was associated with this instance.

Node.Name: InstanceNotStarted
Node.Text: The requested operation cannot be performed on this instance. The instance is not started yet.

Node.Name: OtherTaskRunningAlready
Node.Text: Other task '{0}' is running already on this instance.

Node.Name: RunTaskCanNotBeUsedToStart
Node.Text: The '{0}' created run task cannot be used to start this instance.

Node.Name: RunTaskWasNotCreated
Node.Text: The run task was not been created.

Node.Name: RunTaskCanceled
Node.Text: The run task has been canceled.

Node.Name: UnexpectedRunTaskStatus
Node.Text: Such '{0}' run task status was not expected after the task has been completed successfully. Expected status is '{1}'.

Node.Name: InvalidSchedulerToStart
Node.Text: Supplied scheduler can not be used to start the instance.

Node.Name: StartSentAlready
Node.Text: The start has been begun on the instance already.

Node.Name: AppHasNotScheduler
Node.Text: An application hasn't a task scheduler.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: An exception occured during the attempt to start the instance.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: An exception occured during the attempt to stop the instance.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: Unable to continue an operation. Stop has been requested.\r\nStop request reason: '{0}'.

Node.Name: DotNetSchedulerUsed
Node.Text: Due to the '{0}' scheduler uses the .NET platform task scheduler the requested operation cannot be performed.

Node.Name: CanNotQueueTaskDueInvalidStatus
Node.Text: The '{0}' task cannot be queued on the '{1}' scheduler. The task have invalid status '{2}'.

Node.Name: CanNotQueueTaskDueQueueFull
Node.Text: The '{0}' task cannot be queued on the '{1}' scheduler. The scheduler task queue has reached a maximum length. The maximum length is '{2:d}'.

Node.Name: NoAssociatedThread
Node.Text: There is not a thread associated with this worker instance.

Node.Name: AttemptStopItself
Node.Text: An attempt to stop this instance of executor has been made. The attempt has been made from invalid thread. The thread can not stop itself.

Node.Name: StopAttemptUnsucceeded
Node.Text: An attempt to stop this instance of executor was resulted with fail. At the attempt completion the executor thread continued to run.

Node.Name: SetReadOnlyCanceled
Node.Text: The operation of setting the 'read-only' mode on the '{0}' resource has been canceled.

Node.Name: MaxSizeOfRecursiveLockReached
Node.Text: The size of the lock-recursion has reached a maximum.

Node.Name: InvalidTimeout
Node.Text: The lock time-out value is invalid.

Node.Name: MaxSizeOfWaitingQueueReached
Node.Text: The size of the waiting queue has reached a maximum.

Node.Name: RepeatedUsageOfCookie
Node.Text: The repeated usage of the lock cookie has detected.

Node.Name: NullResource
Node.Text: The null reference has been detected among the lockable resources set.

Node.Name: SpinningLimitReached
Node.Text: The limit of max. count of spinning has reached.

Node.Name: InvalidThread
Node.Text: The lock release was attempted in the invalid thread.

Node.Name: InvalidCookie
Node.Text: The lock cookie used to release the lock is invalid.

Node.Name: InvalidDeviceInterfaceAddress
Node.Text: The '{0:G}' specified device interface address is invalid.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: Ошибка завершения сеанса работы с устройством.

Node.Name: ZReaderDllFunctionFailed
Node.Text: Функция '{0}' библиотеки ZReader.dll возвратила код сбоя операци {1:d}.

Node.Name: InconsequentNotificationOccurred
Node.Text: An inconsequent notification was received from device. It means the kind of received notification is not matching to expected kind.

Node.Name: UnknownNotificationOccurred
Node.Text: An unknown notification was received from device.

Node.Name: ExponentComponentTooBig
Node.Text: The Exponent component of the specified RSA parameters is too big (greater than 32 bits).

Node.Name: PasswordTooSmall
Node.Text: The specified password is too short. Minimum password length is '{0:D}'.

Node.Name: PasswordTooBig
Node.Text: The specified password is too long. Maximum password length is '{0:D}'.

Node.Name: ReadingPasswordFailed
Node.Text: Reading the password has failed. See the inner exception for more details (if it presented).

Node.Name: InstanceNotInitialized
Node.Text: The instance of the '{0}' has not been initialized yet.

Node.Name: CoreAppDescriptionPackageNotFound
Node.Text: A description package of the core app not found (looked for file path is '{0}').

Node.Name: TypeOfCreatedServiceIncompatibleWithRequested
Node.Text: The '{0}' type of the created service is incompatible with the '{1}' requested service type.

Node.Name: MoreThanOneCoreAppDescriptionInPackage
Node.Text: The '{0}' loaded description package contains more than one description of the core app.

Node.Name: DeserializedNotValid
Node.Text: The '{0}' deserialized instance cannot be treated as valid.

Node.Name: AbstractVirtual
Node.Text: The '{0}' method cannot be a serialization callback method. The method is abstract or virtual and not sealed.

Node.Name: InvalidSignature
Node.Text: The '{0}' method cannot be a serialization callback method. The signature of the method not conforms to the requirements to be a serialization callback method.

Node.Name: DuplicatedCallbackAttributeDefinition
Node.Text: There is an error in the definition of the serialization callback. The '{0}' serialization callback attribute is defined twice at least: on the '{1}' method and on the '{2}' method.

Node.Name: DeserializedRequiredStateValidationException
Node.Text: The validation against the required state after deserialization has revealed an error(s).

Node.Name: FieldPropertyCanNotBeNull
Node.Text: The value of the specified field/property cannot be null.

Node.Name: FieldPropertyValueNotValid
Node.Text: Value of the specified field/property is not valid.

Node.Name: DataContractNotDefined
Node.Text: The '{0}' data contract attribute not defined on the specified '{1}' type.

Node.Name: NoMatchContractNamespace
Node.Text: The data contract namespace matching to the '{0}' type not found against the data contract namespaces defined on the '{1}' assembly.

Node.Name: ContractNamespaceNotDefined
Node.Text: The data contract namespace not defined for the '{0}' type.

Node.Name: TypeContractNameCollision
Node.Text: A collision occurred on registering the '{0}' name as a contract name of the '{1}' type. The '{0}' name is already registered as the contract name of the '{2}' type.

Node.Name: InvalidDeclaredTypeContract
Node.Text: The '{0}' contract of the declared type cannot be used to resolve the '{1}' name. The contract presents the '{2}' type. This type conforms to one of the following: a generic type definition, a genetic type parameter, a type containing a generic parameter(s).

Node.Name: IncorrectAdvanedResolution
Node.Text: An advanced resolution of the '{0}' name has returned an invalid result: the '{1}' returned type is incompatible with the '{2}' declared type.

Node.Name: UninitializedInstanceNotCreated
Node.Text: An uninitialized instance of the '{0}' type was not been created by the '{1}' deserialization provider.

Node.Name: EmptyContext
Node.Text: The supplied serialization context is empty.

Node.Name: PrivateScopeField
Node.Text: The '{0}' field is invalid contract member. The field is a private-scope field (field cannot be referenced).

Node.Name: IncompatibleFieldAttributes
Node.Text: The '{0}' field is invalid contract member. The field definition is not compatible with a contract member requirements. Particularly, the field should not be defined as '{1}'.

Node.Name: MemberIsIndexedProperty
Node.Text: The '{0}' contract member is invalid. This member is an indexed property.

Node.Name: MemberIsReadOrWriteOnly
Node.Text: The '{0}' contract member is invalid. This member is a read-only (or write-only) property.

Node.Name: MemberIsAbstract
Node.Text: The '{0}' contract member is invalid. This member is a property with abstract accessor(s).

Node.Name: NotEnumType
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified type is not a type of an enumeration.

Node.Name: MultiDimensionalArrayNotSupported
Node.Text: The specified array is a multi-dimensional array. The multi-dimensional arrays aren't supported for serialization/deserialization.

Node.Name: NegativeLowerBoundNotSupported
Node.Text: The specified array has a negative lower bound (is '{0:d}'). Such array is not supported for serialization/deserialization.

Node.Name: NotArrayType
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified type is not an array type.

Node.Name: ContractMemberNameNotUnique
Node.Text: The '{0}' member name of the '{1}' contract is not unique.

Node.Name: NotComplexType
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified type is not a complex type.

Node.Name: NoDataContractAttribute
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Type/AttributeNotDefined,0,1)) The contract not satisfies the data-contract requirements.

Node.Name: ErrorOnGettingBaseTypeContract
Node.Text: An exception occurred on getting the contract of the '{0}' base type of the '{1}' type. The contract provider is '{2}'.

Node.Name: NotSimpleType
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified type is not a simple type.

Node.Name: ValueTypeMismatchContractType
Node.Text: The '{0}' type of the value is mismatch to the '{1}' type of the '{2}' contract.

Node.Name: NoCurrentMemberForSetValue
Node.Text: Unable to set a value of a contract member. The serialization data bag former is not positioned on the contract member.

Node.Name: ValueTypeMismatchMemberReturnType
Node.Text: Unable to set a value of a contract member. The '{0}' type of the passed value is mismatch to the '{1}' return type of the '{2}' contract member.

Node.Name: InsufficientDataToFormBag
Node.Text: Unable to form a serialization data bag. The current data is not sufficient to form the data bag. A value of the '{0}' required (mandatory) member of the '{1}' contract has not been set.

Node.Name: NoXmlRootAttribute
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Type/AttributeNotDefined,0,1)) The contract cannot be interpreted as XML-serializable.

Node.Name: UnableGetContractName
Node.Text: Unable to get a contract name of the '{0}' type.

Node.Name: DuplicatedContractNamespaceForClrNamespace
Node.Text: A duplicated definition of the contract namespace for the '{0}' CLR-namespace was detected on the '{1}' assembly.

Node.Name: NameNotProvided
Node.Text: A contract member name was not provided during the '{0}' contract member discovery.

Node.Name: ProvidedNameTooLong
Node.Text: A provided name of the '{0}' contract member is too long. Max allowed length is '{1:d}'.

Node.Name: ProvidedNameInvalid
Node.Text: The '{0}' provided name of the '{1}' contract member is not valid.

Node.Name: ReturnTypeNotProvided
Node.Text: A return type of the '{0}' contract member was not provided during the discovery.

Node.Name: DataMemberContradiction_RequiredAndOmmitance
Node.Text: There is a contradiction in the contract member definition. The '{0}' member is defined as a required member and same time defined as a member allowing the omit of the default value.

Node.Name: NoDataMemberAttribute
Node.Text: An attribute of the '{0}' (data member attribute) is not defined for the '{0}' contract member.

Node.Name: ContractMemberNotDiscoveredYet
Node.Text: Invalid operation on the '{0}' contract member. The contract member is not discovered yet.

Node.Name: MemberReturnTypeNotProvided
Node.Text: No return type provided for the '{0}' member of the '{1}' type.

Node.Name: ErrorInAttributeDefinition
Node.Text: There is an error in the definition of the '{0}' contract. The '{1}' attribute should not be defined on the '{2}' type if the '{3}' attribute is defined.

Node.Name: RecursiveDiscoverCall
Node.Text: A recursive contract discovery has been detected. The contract is '{0}'.

Node.Name: TypeContainsGenericParameters
Node.Text: The '{0}' type cannot be used in the contract. $(resolve(/System/ArgumentException/ValueIsInvalid/Type/ContainsGenericParameters,0))

Node.Name: ContractNotDiscoveredYet
Node.Text: Invalid operation on the '{0}' contract. The contract is not discovered yet.

Node.Name: ContractNameNotProvided
Node.Text: A contract name not provided during the contract discovery.

Node.Name: UnableGetContractName
Node.Text: There is insufficient data to determine the contract name of the '{0}' contract.

Node.Name: TypeOfObjectMismatchContractType
Node.Text: The '{0}' type of passed object is mismatch to the '{1}' type of the contract.

Node.Name: NoDeserializationProvider
Node.Text: A deserialization provider was not assigned in the '{0}' serializer settings.

Node.Name: NoSerializationCallbackProvider
Node.Text: A serialization callback provider was not assigned in the '{0}' serializer settings.

Node.Name: SettingsNotInReadOnlyState
Node.Text: The '{0}' supplied settings is not in read-only state.

Node.Name: ObjectContractMismatchBaseContract
Node.Text: The '{0}' object's contract is mismatch to the '{1}' base contract.

Node.Name: NoContractProvider
Node.Text: A contract provider was not assigned in the '{0}' serializer settings.

Node.Name: NoContractResolver
Node.Text: A contract resolver was not assigned in the '{0}' serializer settings.

Node.Name: TypeNotSupported
Node.Text: This type '{0}' is not supported by the '{1}' serializer for the serialization/deserialization.

Node.Name: FailedToResolveContract
Node.Text: Преобразователь '{0}' не смог преобразовать имя контракта данных '{1}' в тип.

Node.Name: ResolvedTypeIncompatibleWithDeclared
Node.Text: The '{0}' resolver has resolved the '{1}' name to the '{2}' type, but that type is incompatible with the '{3}' declared contract type.

Node.Name: ElementNameMismatchContractName
Node.Text: The '{0}' name of the root XML-element is mismatch to the '{1}' expected name of the '{2}' contract.

Node.Name: NullValueNotSerializable
Node.Text: Unable to serialize/deserialize a null value of the '{0}' type.

Node.Name: OtherWriteOperationExecutes
Node.Text: Unable to create a new write context. Other write operation executes now.

Node.Name: NoContractProvided
Node.Text: The '{1}' contract provider has not provided a contract for the '{0}' type.

Node.Name: ErrorOnGettingCoreAppDescriptionResourceStream
Node.Text: При попытке получить поток ресурса, содержащий пакет описания приложения ядра, возникла ошибка (URI ресурса '{0}').

Node.Name: ValidateDataError
Node.Text: An error occurred during the annotation data validation.

Node.Name: AnnotationValidationException
Node.Text: An error has been detected during the annotation validation.\r\nAnnotation: '{0}'\r\nAnnotated type: '{1}'.

Node.Name: NotSealedAnnotationOnSealedType
Node.Text: Annotation is not sealed, but annotated type is sealed. Note that any sealed type can be annotated with sealed annotation only.

Node.Name: OverridingSealed
Node.Text: Violation of the annotation overriding is occured: specified annotation cannot override the '{0}' base annotation defined on the '{1}' type because the base annotation is sealed.

Node.Name: EffectiveAnnotationListIncorrect
Node.Text: It is unable to correctly form the list of effective annotations for the annotated type.

Node.Name: DefaultMessage
Node.Text: При загрузке пакета описаний возникла ошибка.\r\nЛокатор (ссылка) пакета описаний:\r\n{0}

Node.Name: WithoutNameReference
Node.Text: При загрузке пакета описаний возникла ошибка.

Node.Name: DescriptionPackageLocationNotSupported
Node.Text: The '{0}' description package default location not supported.

Node.Name: ServiceImplementationNotCreatedInputStream
Node.Text: An input stream has not been created by the '{0}' implementation of the '{1}' service.

Node.Name: MetadataNotMarkedValidated
Node.Text: The metadata validation process has completed, but this '{0}' metadata is not marked as validated.

Node.Name: ObjectNotMarkedAsReadOnly
Node.Text: The '{0}' description package object not marked as read-only.

Node.Name: ContractNotSpecified
Node.Text: There is no contract type specified.

Node.Name: ContractNotClass
Node.Text: Specified contract type '{0}' is not a class type.

Node.Name: ContractIsAbstract
Node.Text: Specified contract type '{0}' is an abstract class type. Abstract class type cannot be contract type.

Node.Name: ContractImplementationError
Node.Text: Specified contract type '{0}' is neither a type derived from the type '{1}' nor a type that implements the interface type '{2}'.

Node.Name: ExclusivenessViolation
Node.Text: Violation of the contract exclusiveness is occurred. Contract exclusiveness is violated by the '{0}' annotation.

Node.Name: IvalidFormat
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified description package name reference has invalid format.

Node.Name: DescriptionTreeCanNotBeNull
Node.Text: Дерево описаний не может быть пустым значением (null-значением).

Node.Name: PackageIdentityCanNotBeNull
Node.Text: Идентичность пакета не может быть пустым значением (null-значением).

Node.Name: DefaultDescriptionRefValidationError
Node.Text: Ошибка при проверке ссылки на дефолтное описание пакета.

Node.Name: ElementNotFound
Node.Text: The description element of the '{0}' specified type not found among the child description elements of the '{1}' description.

Node.Name: DeserializedNotValid
Node.Text: The '{0}' deserialized instance cannot be treated as a valid .NET assembly name.

Node.Name: IdAssignedAlready
Node.Text: It is unable to assign the '{0}' identifier to the '{1}' instance. The instance identifier has been assigned already.

Node.Name: DescriptionNotInPackage
Node.Text: The '{0}' supplied description is not a part of package.\r\nTo create an instance based on a description the description must be a part of the description package.

Node.Name: NoDescriptionOfType
Node.Text: The description of the '{0}' type not found on the '{1}' type of instance.

Node.Name: LockReleaseFailException
Node.Text: The attempt to release the lock on the '{0}' resource has been failed.\r\nReason:\r\n'{1}'.

Node.Name: LockAcquisitionFailException
Node.Text: The lock on the '{0}' resource has not been acquired.\r\nReason:\r\n'{1}'.

Node.Name: InvalidNonInfiniteTimeout
Node.Text: Указанное значение '{0}' не представляет небесконечный тайм-аут (период ожидания).

Node.Name: InvalidTimeout
Node.Text: Указанное значение '{0}' не представляет тайм-аут (период ожидания).

Node.Name: NotOwnedByViewModel
Node.Text: The '{0}' command is not owned by the '{1}' view model.

Node.Name: WorkspaceViewModelNotCreated
Node.Text: An app workspace view model has not been created. The creation function has not returned a valid result.

Node.Name: NotifyAboutError
Node.Text: Во время выполнения операции возникла ошибка.

Node.Name: ShownAsDialogAlready
Node.Text: The '{0}' view model is shown as a dialog already.

Node.Name: CyclicDialogChainDetected
Node.Text: It is impossible to complete the building of the dialog chain for the '{0}' view model. The '{1}' view model occurs in the chain more than once, thus building chain is cyclic.

Node.Name: ImpossibleToCloseDialog
Node.Text: It is impossible to close the '{0}' dialog.

Node.Name: ImpossibleToShowDialog
Node.Text: It is impossible to show the '{0}' dialog.

Node.Name: InvalidAsyncActionCookie
Node.Text: It is impossible to complete the operation on the '{0}' view model. The '{1}' specified cookie is invalid.

Node.Name: OtherAsyncActionPerforms
Node.Text: A requested action cannot be performed on the '{0}' view model. The view model is executing other action just now.

Node.Name: ErrorOccurredDuringOperation
Node.Text: An error occurred while executing an operation.

Node.Name: NoView
Node.Text: The '{0}' view model have not a view.

Node.Name: ViewCanNotChangedDueAsyncAction
Node.Text: It is impossible to change a view of the '{0}' view model. A view cannot be changed when a view model is executing an asynchronous action.

Node.Name: NotInBoundsOfAppViewModel
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified view model is not in bounds of the '{1}' app view model. The specified view model is in bounds of the '{2}' app view model.

Node.Name: ContainerAlreadySet
Node.Text: The '{0}' view model is bound with the '{1}' container already.

Node.Name: CanNotContainerForItself
Node.Text: The view model cannot be container for itself.

Node.Name: ContentText
Node.Text: Для указанного объекта отсутствует форма просмотра/редактирования.\r\nВозможно, отсутствует компонент, который бы мог создать требуемую форму для просмотра или редактирования объекта.

Node.Name: IncorrectTypeOfHost
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified service host cannot be used. A service host of the '{1}' type is expected.

Node.Name: FrontServiceNotProvided
Node.Text: A front service instance not provided by the '{0}' service.

Node.Name: TypeOfProvidedFrontServiseUnexpectable
Node.Text: The '{0}' type of the provided front service is unexpected. Expected type is '{1}'.

Node.Name: FrontServiceNotCreated
Node.Text: A front service (the request handler) has not been created by the '{0}' service.

Node.Name: TypeOfFrontServiceNotSpecifiedByAttribute
Node.Text: The '{0}' defined on the '{1}' type attribute not specifies a type of a front service.

Node.Name: FrontServiceTypeNotWCFDataService
Node.Text: The '{0}' type of the front service (specified by the '{1}' attribute on the '{2}' type) is not derived from the '{3}' type, that is the base type for WCF Data Service.

Node.Name: FronServiceTypeNotDefined
Node.Text: A type of the front service is not defined for the '{0}' service. Use the '{1}' attribute to define such type.

Node.Name: UnspecifiedKindUnacceptable
Node.Text: Дата в неопределенном формате (ни локальный, ни UTC) недопустима.

Node.Name: FormatNotSupported
Node.Text: Указанный формат недопустим и не поддерживается.\r\n\tФормат: '{0}'.

Node.Name: ResourceNotFound
Node.Text: В пакете приложения (.xap) по пути '{0}' ресурс отсутствует.

Node.Name: ParseStringValueFailed
Node.Text: The '{0}' string is not valid to be parsed to a value of the '{1}' enumeration type.

Node.Name: NoUserInteractive
Node.Text: Текущий процесс не имеет пользовательского интерфейса.

Node.Name: NoMatchingToIdentityFound
Node.Text: No certificate matching to the '{0}' identity (or reference) was found.

Node.Name: UnableGetIssuerCertificateSerialNumber
Node.Text: Unable to get an issuer's certificate serial number. An issuer's certificate not found.

Node.Name: ContainsEnhancedKeyUsages
Node.Text: The specified extension is not contains a key usage OIDs.

Node.Name: NotValidOnDate
Node.Text: The '{0}' certificate is not valid on this date '{1:u}'.

Node.Name: NotIntendedForCodeSigning
Node.Text: The '{0}' certificate is not intended for code signing purposes. Please ensure that the certificate contains the Code signing extension (OID: {1}).

Node.Name: NotInTrustedPublisherStore
Node.Text: The '{0}' certificate is not presented in the '{1:G}' store of '{2:G}' location.

Node.Name: CanNotBeUsedForCodeSigning
Node.Text: The specified X.509 certificate cannot be used for code signing.\r\nReason is: {0}

Node.Name: KeyAlgorithmNotSupported
Node.Text: The key algorithm of the specified certificate is not supported.

Node.Name: TooSmallKeySize
Node.Text: The algorithm key size of the specified certificate is too small.

Node.Name: NotX509Certificate2
Node.Text: The '{0}' type of the X.509 certificate object is not supported. Expected type of the object is '{1}' (or derived).

Node.Name: SignerCertificateNotValid
Node.Text: The '{0}' signer's certificate is not valid.\r\n{1}

Node.Name: SuiteNotFound
Node.Text: The security algorithm suite not found. Suite name is '{0}'.

Node.Name: CanNotContainNonUnique
Node.Text: Последовательность не может содержать неуникальные элементы.

Node.Name: IdenticalValues
Node.Text: Последовательность содержит идентичные значения в '{0}' и '{1}' позициях.

Node.Name: InvalidValueAt
Node.Text: Последовательность содержит недопустимое значение в позиции '{0}'.

Node.Name: NullAt
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Array/CanNotContainNull)) Указанное значение обнаружено в позиции '{0}' последовательности.

Node.Name: ExpectedLength
Node.Text: The size of the sequence is invalid. The sequence of size '{0:D}' expected.

Node.Name: TooBig
Node.Text: Размер указанной последовательности (или массива) слишком велик.

Node.Name: ExpectedMaxLength
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Array/TooBig)) Ожидаемый максимальный размер последовательности составляет '{0}' элемент(-ов).

Node.Name: TooSmall
Node.Text: Размер указанной последовательности (или массива) слишком мал.

Node.Name: ExpectedMinimalLength
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Array/TooSmall)) Ожидаемый минимальный размер последовательности составляет '{0}' элемент(-ов).

Node.Name: NotOneDimensional
Node.Text: The specified array is multi-dimensional ({0}-dimensional), but expected the one-dimensional array.

Node.Name: NotMatchRegex
MaxLength
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/String/TooLong)) Максимально допустимая длина строки составляет '{0}' символ(-а)(-ов).

Node.Name: MinLength
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/String/TooSmall)) Минимально допустимая длина строки составляет '{0}' символ(-а)(-ов).

Node.Name: CanNotEmptyOrWhiteSpace
Node.Text: Значение не может быть пустой строкой или строкой, содержащей только пробельные символы.

Node.Name: CanNotNullOrWhiteSpace
Node.Text: Значение не может быть null, пустой строкой или строкой, содержащей только пробельные символы.

Node.Name: CanNotNullOrEmpty
Node.Text: Значение не может быть null или пустой строкой.

Node.Name: CanNotEmpty
Node.Text: Значение не может быть пустой строкой.

Node.Name: CanNotWhiteSpace
Node.Text: Значение не может быть строкой, состоящей только из пробельных символов.

Node.Name: NonValidHexString
Node.Text: Указанная строка не соответствует формату представления данных в hex-кодировке.

Node.Name: LeadingTrailingWhiteSpaceNotAllowed
Node.Text: Значение не может быть строкой с лидирующими или завершающими пробельными символами.

Node.Name: TooManyComponents
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/String/InvalidFormat)) Строка содержит слишком много компонентов в контексте применения указанного формата. Макс. допустимое количество компонентов '{0}'.

Node.Name: ObjectDisposedException
Node.Text: Невозможно выполнить операцию, так как объект находится в состоянии выгрузки или уже выгружен.

Node.Name: DisposeRequested
Node.Text: Невозможно выполнить операцию, так как для объекта ранее была запрошена выгрузка.

Node.Name: NoMoreNodeForReading
Node.Text: There is no more nodes for reading. Probably, an XML-reader has reached an end of file.

Node.Name: Detailed
Node.Text: The '{0}' element is expected, but an XML-reader positioned on a node of the '{1:G}' type (name is '{2}').

Node.Name: NodeTypeExpected
Node.Text: The '{0:G}' node type expected, but an XML-reader positioned on a node of the '{1:G}' type (name is '{2}').

Node.Name: EndElementExpected
Node.Text: An end of element expected, but a XML-reader positioned on a node of the '{0:G}' type.

Node.Name: Name
Node.Text: An end of the '{0}' element expected, but a XML-reader positioned on a node of the '{1:G}' type.

Node.Name: UnableReadContentAs
Node.Text: It is unable to read the text content as a value of the '{0}' type.

Node.Name: TextContentTooLong
Node.Text: The text content of the node is too long. It is expected that length of the text content not more than '{0:d}' chars.

Node.Name: InvalidWriteState
Node.Text: The XML-writer is in invalid write-state.

Node.Name: InvalidCastException
Node.Text: Невозможно привести значение типа '{0}' к значению типа '{1}'.

Node.Name: InnerException
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/OverflowException)) See the inner exception for more details.

Node.Name: GenericTypeWithArgsNotAllowed
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is a generic type. But this type is not a definition of the generic type. Such type cannot be used in the context of the current operation.

Node.Name: SpecialNamedTypeNotAllowed
Node.Text: The '{0}' type has a special name. The type with a special name cannot be used in the context of the current operation.

Node.Name: NestedTypeNotAllowed
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is a nested type. The nested type cannot be used in the context of the current operation.

Node.Name: ArrayTypeNotAllowed
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is an array type. The array type cannot be used in the context of the current operation.

Node.Name: InterfaceNotAllowed
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is an interface type. The interface type cannot be used in the context of the current operation.

Node.Name: NotBaseOf
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified type is not a base type of the '{1}' type.

Node.Name: AmbiguousImplementationOfT
Node.Text: Тип '{0}' имеет множественную реализацию типа '{1}'. Ожидалось, что указанный тип имеет только одну реализацию.

Node.Name: TypeOfGenericArgumentInvalid
Node.Text: The '{0}' argument of the '{1}' generic parameter of the '{2}' generic type definition is invalid.

Node.Name: AttributeNotDefined
Node.Text: An attribute of the '{0}' type is not defined on the '{1}' type.

Node.Name: InvalidDerivation
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is wrong. A type derived from the '{1}' type expected.

Node.Name: GenericDefinitionUnusable
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is a generic type definition. Generic type definition cannot be used.

Node.Name: AbstractNotAllowed
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is an abstract type. Abstract types not allowed.

Node.Name: NotEnum
Node.Text: Указанный тип не является типом перечисления.\r\n\tТип:\r\n\t\t{0}

Node.Name: NotClass
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is not a class type.

Node.Name: NotInterface
Node.Text: The '{0}' type is not an interface type.

Node.Name: NotValueType
Node.Text: Тип '{0}' не является значимым типом (типом структуры).

Node.Name: CtorAmbiguity
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Type/InstantiationFaulted,0)) Есть неоднозначность. Указанной сигнатуре '{1}' соответствует по меньшей мере два конструктора: '{2}' и '{3}'.

Node.Name: NoDefaultCtor
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Type/InstantiationFaulted,0)) The type have not a default constructor.

Node.Name: CtorInvocationFail
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Type/InstantiationFaulted,0)) An exception occurred during the '{1}' constructor invocation.

Node.Name: TypeIsAbstract
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Type/InstantiationFaulted,0)) The specified type is an abstract type. The abstract type cannot be instantiated.

Node.Name: TypeIsInterface
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Type/InstantiationFaulted,0)) The specified type is an interface type.

Node.Name: TypeIsGenericDefinition
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Type/InstantiationFaulted,0)) The specified type is a generic type definition.

Node.Name: TypeIsPointer
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Type/InstantiationFaulted,0)) The specified type is a pointer. The pointer cannot be instantiated.

Node.Name: ByName
Node.Text: Не удалось найти тип по указанному имени '{0}'.

Node.Name: TypeOfValueNotInValidRange
Node.Text: The '{0}' type of the specified value is out of range of the valid types.

Node.Name: ValueOutOfRange
Node.Text: The specified value is out of the range of the valid values.

Node.Name: NotWholeNumber
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/ArgumentOutOfRangeException/ValueOutOfRange)) The specified value '{0}' is not a whole number.

Node.Name: OutOfRange
Node.Text: Значение не входит в диапазон допустимых значений.

Node.Name: CanNotLessThanZero
Node.Text: Значение не может быть меньше ноля.

Node.Name: CanNotLessThanOne
Node.Text: Значение не может быть меньше единицы.

Node.Name: CanNotLessThan
Node.Text: Значение не может быть меньше, чем '{0}'.

Node.Name: OtherArg
Node.Text: Значение не может быть меньше, чем значение '{0}' аргумента '{1}'.

Node.Name: OtherArg2
Node.Text: Значение '{0}' не может быть меньше, чем значение '{1}' аргумента '{2}'.

Node.Name: CanNotGreaterThan
Node.Text: The value cannot be greater than '{0}'.

Node.Name: CanNotEqualTo
Node.Text: The value cannot equal to the '{0}' value.

Node.Name: CanNotNaN
Node.Text: Значение соответсвует константе NaN и не представляет число.

Node.Name: CanNotNegativeInfinity
Node.Text: Значение не может представлять бесконечное множество отрицительных чисел.

Node.Name: CanNotPositiveInfinity
Node.Text: Значение не может представлять бесконечное множество положительных чисел.

Node.Name: Incompatible
Node.Text: Указанный тип '{0}' не совместим с типом '{1}'.

Node.Name: XmlValueNotConformsToXmlSchema
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/ArgumentException/ValueIsInvalid)) The specified value doesn't conform to the particular XML-schema.

Node.Name: XmlValueCouldNotBeDeserialized
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/ArgumentException/ValueIsInvalid)) Указанный XML не может быть десериализован в объект указанного типа. Возможно, XML не соответствует определенной XML-схеме.

Node.Name: Expected
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/ArgumentException/ValueIsInvalid)) The '{0}' type is expected, but specified the '{1}' type.

Node.Name: ContainsGenericParameters
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/ArgumentException/ValueIsInvalid)) The '{0}' specified type contains a generic type parameter(s) that not replaced with specific type(s).

Node.Name: GenericTypeNotSupported
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/ArgumentException/ValueIsInvalid)) The '{0}' specified type is generic. The generic types aren't supported.

Node.Name: NoImplementationOfT
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/ArgumentException/ValueIsInvalid)) The '{0}' type is not an implementation of the '{1}' type.

Node.Name: InvalidOrClosed
Node.Text: The wait handle is invalid or closed.

Node.Name: CanNotModifyObjectDueReadOnly
Node.Text: Невозможно изменить объект. Объект недоступен для редактирования.\r\nОбъект:\r\n{0}

Node.Name: UIRequired
Node.Text: Для выполнения запрошенной операции требуется пользовательский интерфейс. $(resolve(/System/Environment/NoUserInteractive))

Node.Name: OperationNotAvailable
Node.Text: Запрошенная операция недоступна и не может быть выполнена.

Node.Name: PortNotSpecified
Node.Text: В указанном URI не указан порт.\nURI:\n\t{0}

Node.Name: NorLoopbackNorUnc
Node.Text: Указанный URI '{0}' не является ссылкой на локальный ресурс или ресурс в сети.

Node.Name: NotLoopback
Node.Text: Указанный URI '{0}' не является ссылкой на локальный ресурс.

Node.Name: FragmentOrUserInfoNotAllowed
Node.Text: Указанный URI '{0}' содержит фрагмент или сведения пользователя, что недопустимо.

Node.Name: FieldValueNotValid
Node.Text: Deserialized value of the '{0}' field of the '{1}' type is not valid.

Node.Name: InnerException
Node.Text: $(resolve(/System/Runtime/Serialization/SerializationException/FieldValueNotValid,0,1)) See the inner exception for more details.

Node.Name: DirectoryNotFoundException
Node.Text: Каталог '{0}' не найден. Возможно, каталог не сущестсвует или недостаточно прав доступа для чтения каталогов.

Node.Name: FileNotFoundException
Node.Text: Файл '{0}' не найден. Возможно, файл не сущестсвует или недостаточно прав доступа для чтения содержимого каталогов.

Node.Name: Invalid
Node.Text: The '{0}' specified path is not valid.

Node.Name: SuchNotAllowed
Node.Text: Указанное значение GUID является недопустимым в данном контексте.
